ai-mil7.5.4:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, when there was something I considered, a single ploughman who would be considered?”
ai-mil7.5.4:1.2_0: “Just as the birds contained up the herbs, which were drawn up the limbs and neck.
ai-mil7.5.4:1.3_0: In the same way, the meditator who is like the oppressive knowledge ...
ai-mil7.5.4:1.4_0: This is how a single one of these, great king, has to take one place.
ai-mil7.5.4:2.4_0: they’re hard to defeat at all.’”
